name: Wonderful tonight
lyric:
[00:21.970]It's late in the evening
[00:26.810]she's wondering what clothes to wear.
[00:32.000]She puts on her make-up
[00:36.950]and brushes her long blonde hair.
[00:42.210]And then she asks me, Do I look all right?
[00:50.500]And I say, Yes, you look wonderful tonight.
[00:57.700]
[01:07.580]We go to a party and everyone turns to see
[01:17.670]This beautiful lady that's walking around with me.
[01:28.060]And then she asks me, Do you feel all right?
[01:36.210]And I say, Yes, I feel wonderful tonight.

[01:45.750]I feel wonderful because I see

[02:10.378]

[02:38.530]So I give her the car keys and she helps me to bed.
[02:48.650]And then I tell her, as I turn out the light,
[02:57.340]I say, My darling, you were wonderful tonight.
[03:07.970]Oh my darling, you were wonderful tonight.
[03:19.880]
